Services

    Small Animals

    Surgery, dental, neutering, vaccination, microchipping, and more

    Large Animals

    Consultations, on-farm visits, TB testing, and more

    Equine

    Pre-purchase vetting, ultrasounds, x-rays, blood tests, reproduction services, and more

    Small Animals Services

    We offer a plethora of services delivered by our expert staff

    Vaccinations & Health Checks

    We strongly recommend bringing your pet to the vet at least once a year. These annual check-ups are essential for picking up any health concerns. These comprehensive exams include a thorough physical assessment, vaccinations and preventative care tailored to your pet’s age and needs. Regular health checks help detect potential issues early, ensuring timely treatment and promoting overall well-being. Vaccinations are essential in protecting your pet against potentially fatal diseases.

    Microchipping

    The mandatory microchipping of dogs came into effect in 2015 under the Animal Health & Welfare Act 2013. This simple procedure provides a permanent identification solution, ensuring your furry friend can be easily returned if lost. Our team will guide you through the process and register your pet’s information in the national database, FIDO. Protect your pet and gain peace of mind. Microchip your pet today!

    Neutering/Spaying

    There are numerous advantages to neutering/spaying your pet. It can help manage pet populations, and improve your pet’s health. These procedures can prevent certain diseases, reduce behavioural issues, and contribute to a longer, healthier life for your pet. Our team will provide compassionate care before, during and after the surgery, ensuring a smooth recovery.

    Ultrasonography

    We offer non-invasive ultrasound services for precise diagnostics and monitoring. This allows our veterinarians to visualise internal organs in real-time, aiding in the detection of heart diseases, liver and kidney issues, and reproductive health concerns.

    Radiography

    Our in-house x-rays allow us to see the full picture of what is going on with your pet. We can view internal organs, observe bone structure, assess if your pet is developing arthritis in their old age, or if they have eaten something they shouldn’t have…

    In-house biochemistry & haematology

    Our clinic offers in-house biochemistry and haematology bloodwork. These advanced tests allow us to assess your pet’s organ function, detect infections, and monitor overall health, allowing us to provide immediate and effective care with the latest diagnostic technology.

    Dental services

    From routine descale & polishes, to advanced dental procedures, our team ensures optimal oral care. We also provide dental radiography for accurate diagnosis and treatment of dental issues. Trust us to maintain your pet’s oral health and overall well-being with our expert care.

    New puppy/kitten clinic

    We want to give your young pet the best start in life. Our new pippy/kitten consultations include essential vaccinations, an overall health check, nutritional advice and behavioural advice. Our caring team will support you every step of the way, ensuring your new furry family member grows up happy and healthy!

    Senior clinic

    We believe that our beloved pets that are entering their ‘golden years’, deserve a little extra TLC. These comprehensive check-ups include a thorough nose-to-tail examination, nutritional advice, bloodwork, dental check, and tailored health plans to address common age-related issues. Our team will provide expert care and support for your senior pet’s unique needs, enhancing their quality of life. “My face may be white, but my heart is pure gold. There is no shame in growing old”.

    Exotics & Wildlife

    From treating injured hedgehogs to performing beak & claw trims on parrots, our team is ready and willing to help

    Nutrition & Food

    We stock a wide range for both cats and dogs from CALIBRA, including puppy/kitten, junior & adult maintenance, senior diets and veterinary specialist diets. Speak to a member of the team to find the right food for your pet!

    Pet Passport

    Travelling can be stressful! Let us help you to minimise that stress by making sure your pet is all-set for their travels. We will provide the necessary vaccinations, health checks and documentation required for your international travel. Let us help you create unforgettable adventures with your pet!
